All simulations were carried out using GROMACS
50 with a 1 fs time step and a 1.0 nm cutoff for the direct van der Waals and for Coulombic interactions. Long-range Coulombic interactions were accounted for by the particle-mesh Ewald (PME) method. For practical reasons, the birnessite lattice was modeled with Mn 3.75+ as in Cygan et al.( 39) but with Lennard-Jones forcefield parameters recently reported by Newton and Kwon.
51 Water was described with the SPC/E model,
52 and K + ions were described with SPC/E compatible ion-pair potentials from Joung and Cheatham.
